author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-313.  Permit task state to be saved so that single tasks may be manually re-executed when debugging.  Contributed by Owen.

author: jeremias
msg: Showing a problem with SVG used inside a basic-link. The size of the link rect is wrong and only spans the area of the nominal line rect. (As reported on fop-users)

author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-352.  Fix shell scripts to use /bin/sh instead of /bin/bash for better portability.  Contributed by Jean-Baptiste Quenot.

author: deepal
msg: - fixing namespace ignorance problem in RPC Message receiver
